THIS PETITION IS FILED UNDER SECTION 24 OF CPC, PRAYING
TO TRANSFER THE CASE IN M.C.NO.674/2021 ON THE FILE OF IV
ADDITIONAL PRINCIPAL FAMILY COURT AT MYSURU TO THE COURT
OF SENIOR CIVIL JUDGE AT PUTTUR, D.K.DISTRICT BY ALLOWING
THIS PETITION AND GRANT SUCH OTHER AND FURTHER RELIEF'S AS
THIS COURT DEEMS FIT AND PROPER UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES
OF THIS CASE, IN THE INTEREST OF JUSTICE AND EQUITY.
2
